question: Which country will host the 2023 African Games?
explanation: The 13th edition of the African Games is expected to be held in 3 cities in Ghana in the year 2023. This will be the second time in history that the games will be decentralized in a process that started in the previous edition held in Morocco. Due to this: three cities in the country were chosen for these functions Accra, Kumasi, and Cape Coast.
